column2: location=Just outside of the [[Great Gate of Minas Tirith]]

column1: The '''Gateway''' was a short roadway from the [[Great Gate of Minas Tirith]] that led into the [[Pelennor Fields]]. On [[1 May]] {{TA
column3: Chief}}</ref> [[Aragorn]] halted a furlong from the walls of [[Minas Tirith]] at the start of the Gateway before advancing to be crowned King of [[Gondor]].<ref>{{RK
